description: Currently, rescue/unrescue is only available over the admin API. Non-admin tenants also need to be able to access this functionality.
title: Rescue needs to be available to the public API as an extension

comments.content: Currently, rescue/unrescue is only available over the admin API. Non-admin tenants also need to be able to access this functionality.
